subskills: ReacJS, NodeJS, Wordpress, Ajax, Bootstrap, Json
Laravel, Django, Visual Studio Code, IntelliJ IDEA, XAMPP, Postman, FileZilla

work.title: Weather to Wear
work.description: Create an iOS application called 'Weather to Wear' that provides clothing recommendations based on weather conditions and location, along with a 10-day weather forecast for users.

work.title: Flash Chat
work.description: Flash Chat is a chat platform that enables users to create an account, log in, and exchange messages within the chat interface. Additionally, the application features an eye-catching animated logo.

work.title: Tic Tac Toe
work.description: In my iOS Tic Tac Toe game, players can place their marks (X or O) on the grid, aiming to achieve a winning pattern. The app recognizes and highlights a player's victory, adding excitement and engagement to the gameplay.

work.title: Clima
work.description: Clima is a weather application that retrieves current weather information for a specified location. Additionally, it adapts its background to suit either a light or dark theme, enhancing the user experience based on their preference and time of day

testimonials.quote: Kodeeshwari is an invaluable asset, showcasing exceptional commitment, expertise, and a positive, supportive approach in iOS development.
testimonials.author: Daniel Carvalho

testimonials.quote: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts...
testimonials.author: Daniel Foster
